short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR of anything instantly. Just right click and generate QR of images and links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A light-weight extension to create QR codes of anything. It generates the QR instantly.

Currently supports:

- Links
- Text
- Images

Just right click on whatever you need the QR for and select 'QR this'. You'll see the QR right away.
